review: It's a cool device. However, I did not know I would have to pay $3.99 for movies as old as "My Cousin Vinny." A more logical approach would be to partner with Redbox.
author: Albert

review: I got this so I could watch Prime and Netflix in my bedroom. It was easy to set up and easy to use. Fast, looks good. My TV is wall mounted and I like that I don't see the Firestick.
author: Jennifer Arendas

review: was everything it was advertised to be
author: Mike Wells

review: Good addition to my TV viewing
author: Amazon Customer

review: Movies are good but the games(free) are not my cup of tea.
author: James

review: Wish there was HBOGo, heard it is coming soon. But other than that it is perfect for a college student who doesn't want to pay for cable!
author: beentheredonethat

review: Great product..Love the price for what you get with it!!
author: Steve Cairns

review: Quick and easy install.  You know the product design is right when the install manual is a few simple steps.  Well done Amazon!
author: Paul Grey
